item.title: Resident Evil: 8 Best Opening Lines In The Series, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Many Resident Evil games start strong with iconic opening lines.
  • "Alpha Team Is Flying Around The Forest Zone Situated In Northwest Raccoon City" sets the tone with a mix of information and horror.
  • Memorable lines like "1998...I'll Never Forget It" in Resident Evil 4 highlight the series' dark history.

The Resident Evil games always know how to kick things off with a bang. While many of the games will have incredibly memorable opening acts, such as the Village horde in Resident Evil 4 or the prison sequence in Code Veronica , even before that, there’s always an opening line that sets the stage for the adventure to come.

Not every first line in these games has ended up being very memorable, but in stark contrast, others have become iconic for how impactful they are. Whether it’s a character’s inner thoughts, narration in the context of the story, or even a quick one-liner, there have been plenty of great first lines in the Resident Evil games, so it’s time to rank them to see which stands as the most memorable of them all.

8 “Go On, Get Out Of Here. This Place Is Finished” - Resident Evil Code Veronica

Rodrigo Gives Claire And The Player An Eerie Warning At The Beginning Of Code Veronica

Players are thrown into quite the action fest upon booting up Code Veronica with the hectic intro cutscene that sees Claire invading an Umbrella base. After that though, the game simmers down a little as Claire finds herself trapped in a prison, only for a mysterious man to wander in, seemingly wounded, as he says to Claire in a defeated voice to get out, admitting “This place is finished”.

This line immediately creates an aura of mystery that pulls players right into the story. Where exactly has Claire ended up? And what’s happened to cause such a commotion? All of this is revealed throughout the course of the adventure, but this line from Rodrigo did a great job of setting the stage.

7 “Alpha Team Is Flying Around The Forest Zone Situated In Northwest Raccoon City” - Resident Evil Remake

An Opening Line Which Gets Straight To The Point, While Also Name Dropping The Infamous Raccoon City

The Resident Evil Remake wastes no time getting into the meat of the story, letting players know exactly what’s going on, and where they are geographically. At the same time though, it does also feed into the horror aspect of the series by making specific mention of a forest, and of course, the name drop of Raccoon City will invoke fear in any players who have come back to this game after playing Resident Evil 2 .

The visual that accompanies the line, showing a POV view of the helicopter flying across the dark and dreary forest adds even more to the scare factor. Overall, this is an opening line that does exactly what it needs to by giving players just enough to have them hooked, without revealing too much about the story in the process.

6 “I Shoud’ve Seen It Coming…” - Resident Evil 5

A Grizzled Veteran Like Chris Isn't All Too Surprised By Another Bioterror Attack

By the time Chris appears in Resident Evil 5 , he has become somewhat of a grizzled veteran when it comes to stopping bioterror plots and attacks. His extensive experience in this particular field is made very clear in this short but sweet opening line to the game, where Chris openly admits he’s not all that surprised that yet another outbreak has popped up, this time, in Kijuju.

After playing the full game though, and learning how complex the situation in Kijuju really is, even involving Albert Wesker himself, it gives this line an entirely different meaning, since, in reality, Chris would have no idea what he would be going up against.

5 “Long Ago, A Young Girl Went With Her Mother To Pick Berries For Her Father Who Was Hard At Work” - Resident Evil Village

A Storybook-Like Opening To The Unique Story Of Village

The intro to Village is unlike anything ever seen in the series before. It essentially plays like a storybook which vaguely lays out the entire plot of the game, but at the very beginning of the story is the setup: a young girl venturing into the forest to find some berries for her hard-working father. This is a metaphor for Rose, Ethan’s daughter, who ends up being snatched away and separated between the Four Lords who each serve under Mother Miranda.

This opening line stands out for many reasons, one of which is how it is literally the beginning of a fable, which makes it seem as though players have booted up the wrong game entirely. This simply makes it great for subverting expectations though, and in turn, a memorable quote that kicks off Ethan’s final journey in the series.

4 “Bioterror. The World Lives With It. You Live With It” - Resident Evil Revelations 2

A Stark Reminder Of Just How Rampant Bioterror Had Become In The Resident Evil Universe

After the events of Resident Evil 2 , bioterrorist attacks became a common occurrence across the entire world. It can be easy to forget just how easy it was for bad actors to get their hands on viruses and mutations, but this line said at the very beginning of Revelations 2 , serves as a crucial reminder of just how widespread this issue really is.

It’s also quite a clever introduction to the game as it acts as an advertisement that would be presumably seen on the everyday news in the Resident Evil universe. Seeing the word ‘bioterror’ being thrown around so liberally really emphasizes just how normalized it had become, which is utterly terrifying.

3 “What Have We Got Here?” - Resident Evil 2

A Young And Naive Leon's First Words Upon Entering The Raccoon City Nightmare

Though there is a small bit of narration going over the events of the first game at the beginning of Resident Evil 2 , this is the first line said by a character, specifically Leon, as he rolls up to the zombie-infested Raccoon City. After turning up late to his first day on the job, Leon encounters a few dead bodies and a city that seems more or less deserted, causing him to question what in the world happened.

This quote hits pretty hard considering Leon had absolutely no idea the nightmarish situation he was about to plunge himself into, and one that would scar him for the rest of his days. It also just highlighted how naive Leon still was at this point, and his innocence as a character.

2 “It All Began As An Ordinary Day In September, An Ordinary Day In Raccoon City” - Resident Evil 3

Jill Gives A Haunting Account Of The Events That Transpired In Raccoon City That Fateful Day

The original Resident Evil 3’s opening line excels at getting players intrigued from the moment they load in. Narrated by none other than Jill herself, she opens the game by reflecting on the beginning of the Raccoon City outbreak, and how everything was seemingly as normal as could be before almost the entire population turned into flesh-hungry zombies.

It really puts into perspective just how suddenly the T-virus took hold of people, considering nothing seemed out of the ordinary for at least the first few hours of the day. It therefore makes the incident seem all the more terrifying, resulting in a now iconic memorable line from Jill.

1 “1998…I’ll Never Forget It” - Resident Evil 4

Leon's Trauma As A Survivor Of The Raccoon City Incident Continues To Haunt Him

In terms of mainline games, Resident Evil 4 would be the first appearance of Leon S. Kennedy since his desperate escape from Raccoon City. Even after 6 years, Leon is still visibly haunted by the horrific events that took place back then, as summed up in this well-known opening line which Leon says when reminiscing on those tragic events.

Raccoon City is very much the cornerstone of the entire series and an event that shook the world of Resident Evil to its core, so it feels appropriate that it would be mentioned right off the bat for this new adventure. A slightly different rendition of the quote was said at the start of the remake, which dives even deeper into Leon’s trauma as a survivor of the Raccoon City Incident.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Players Can Pull Off Ridiculous Combo With Scarlet Witch and Doctor Strange
item.description:
Summary

  • Marvel Rivals players are discovering clever combos like Scarlet Witch and Doctor Strange's portal strat.
  • Some fans believe Doctor Strange is essential for good team composition due to his flexibility.
  • The game encourages experimentation with diverse character abilities, leading to creative tag team moves.

A Marvel Rivals player has shared a clip of a clever combo they pulled off involving Scarlet Witch and Doctor Strange. With Marvel Rivals having a wide selection of characters, many fans have been finding out who works best together. While there are already recommended Team-Up synergies and partnerships suggested in-game, some gamers have been discovering how other skills complement each other.

One interesting technique that has been making the rounds is the ingenious usage of Doctor Strange's Pentagram of Farallah in Marvel Rivals . The ability is mostly intended to provide easier transport and support, but some players have found smart ways to defeat enemies with it. And while some fans have already figured out the nuances of the portal to think of counters and avoid mishaps, a few players are still finding other uses for the move.

Reddit user Mycareer shared a Marvel Rivals video of Scarlet Witch and Doctor Strange teaming up to create an interesting combo. In the clip, Strange used the Pentagram of Farallah and connected it to the area where the enemy encounter was happening. Scarlet Witch then activated her Ultimate prior to entering the portal, and moved inside exactly as the skill was finished, which resulted in multiple kills. While Marvel Rivals ' Scarlet Witch is considered one of the easier characters to use, her Ultimate skill is quite difficult to pull off because of how exposed the move prep leaves her. This genius combo allows Scarlet Witch to build up and avoid any damage before finishing.

Team-Ups and Synergies Are Important In Marvel Rivals

Many players commended this ingenious combination, with some fans noting how useful Doctor Strange's portals are in Marvel Rivals . Some in the comments section believed that it's possible that other clever combinations haven't been discovered yet, especially with how flexible Doctor Strange is. Many believe that Strange is an essential pick for any good Marvel Rivals team. Meanwhile, a few users poked fun at Scarlet Witch's voice lines, with some wondering whether the audio could be heard by those on the other side of the portal.

Part of what makes Marvel Rivals ' interesting is seeing many fan-favorites team up and use their skills. The team shooter formula works so well because many characters' abilities are diverse that it encourages experimentation with who makes up each team. Some players have even used a Jeff and Scarlet Witch combo in Marvel Rivals that turned out well. As the game is still in its early stages, fans expect more of these tag team moves to pop up eventually.

item.title: Fortnite: How to Get Master Chief & the Matte Black Style
item.description:
When a Gaming Legends skin comes to Fortnite , there's no telling how long it will be until they return to the Item Shop. For some like Kratos, it's been years, but for some like Master Chief? The time is now. Master Chief, the legendary protagonist of the Halo franchise, has been in cryostasis for almost 1,000 days, and he was last seen on June 3, 2022. That was, until a Christmas miracle on December 23, 2024.

Players can strap into their Spartan armor and drop from the Battle Bus as Petty Officer John-117 to finish this fight and take home the Victory Royale as Xbox's most iconic mascot, but what does the Master Chief Bundle in Fortnite come with, and how many V-Bucks will it cost?

How to Get Master Chief in Fortnite

1,500 V-Bucks

  • Master Chief Outfit

As of December 23, 7 PM ET, players can head to the Fortnite Item Shop to find and purchase Master Chief from his tab section. Master Chief on his own will cost players 1,500 V-Bucks, and not only will they receive the iconic character as a skin, complete with his armor from Halo Infinite , but they will also obtain the Battle Legend Back Bling for free. While Master Chief hasn't been updated to include a LEGO Style, players can grab an assortment of other Halo -related goodies from the Master Chief Bundle, or as separate purchases:

How to Get the Matte Black Master Chief in Fortnite

To obtain the Matte Black Master Chief variant style in Fortnite , players must have opened the Fortnite application on an Xbox Series X|S console, or through the Xbox Cloud Gaming service . Doing so with a registered Fortnite account will automatically grant players access to the Matte Black selectable style once they purchase, or have purchased Master Chief in Fortnite .

item.title: Fortnite: How to Get the Free Winterfest Snoop Dogg Skin
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get the Free Santa Dogg Skin in Fortnite
  • When Will the Santa Dogg Skin Be Available in Fortnite?

There are several events that take place each year in Fortnite , and Winterfest is one of the most anticipated annual celebrations in-game. As is tradition, gamers can visit the Winterfest lodge and open a present with a free cosmetic item every day that the event is live. These freebies are one of the reasons why Winterfest is one of the most anticipated times in Fortnite .

Epic Games tends to give away free skins to commemorate Winterfest, and this time around, it's giving away a free holiday-themed Snoop Dogg skin. This guide will tell players how they can get the free Santa Dogg skin in Fortnite before the offer runs out.

How to Get the Free Santa Dogg Skin in Fortnite

Santa Dogg is one of the rewards being given away in the 2024 Winterfest event. However, unlike most free items in the event, the present containing the Winterfest Snoop Dogg skin cannot be found in the lodge at the moment .

When Will the Santa Dogg Skin Be Available in Fortnite?

Players get to open a new Winterfest present in the lodge every day at 9 AM ET. Epic Games has announced that the free holiday Snoop Dogg will be available on the 25th, which means players will be able to claim Santa Dogg on Wednesday, December 25, at 9 AM ET .

Santa Dogg is not exclusive to the Winterfest event and will be available in the Item Shop at a later date. However, gamers will have to buy it using V-Bucks.
